stories.original_headline: Life may have started as sticky goo clinging to rocks
stories.original_summary: Life may have started in sticky, rock-hugging gels rather than inside cells. Researchers suggest these primitive, biofilm-like materials could trap and concentrate molecules, giving early chemistry a protected space to grow more complex. stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Goo on Rocks May Hold Life's First Spark!
stories.fantasy_story: Ancient wizards now believe that life itself might have begun as sticky, magical goo clinging to old rocks. These peculiar slimes could have trapped vital essences, offering a safe place for early arcane arts to weave their intricate spells. Within these mystical gels, the first whispers of life's complex magic began.

stories.fantasy_headline: Mysterious Star-Stone Showers Our Realm with Life-Giving Water!
stories.fantasy_story: A frozen wanderer from beyond the stars, known as Atlas, has finally graced our realm. The grand sky-wizards, using their mightiest scrying lenses, observed it raining pure water across the sky-dome. This celestial marvel marks the first time water has been seen flowing from such a distant, star-borne artifact.

stories.original_headline: TikTok launches Local Feeds in the US
stories.original_summary: TikTok announced on Wednesday that it's launching "Local Feeds," an opt-in feature that uses precise GPS location data to create a feed of localized content, similar to the "Nearby Feeds" that launched in the UK and Europe in December. stories.fantasy_headline: Whispering Mirror Guild Unveils Local Tales for Western Kingdoms!
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Whispering Mirror Guild has enchanted its scrying mirrors with a new charm for the Western Kingdoms. Now, those who wish can glimpse local tales and visions, guided by their magic compasses. This allows villagers to share unique content specific to their own settlements, much like the Northern and Eastern Lands.

stories.fantasy_headline: Lumina Guild Offers Affordable Color-Changing Light Orbs!
stories.fantasy_story: The Lumina Guild has released remarkable new enchanted light orbs, now available at a grand bargain of twenty gold coins for two! These marvelous glowstones can shift between many colors and shine brightly. They connect to all devices through the universal arcane linking runes, powered by ethereal currents.
